languageStrings.{Hint_SkillTree_LockStatus}:
Whether this character is shown in your network tree or not
depends on what is the furthest you've reached in the game.
languageStrings.{ReachedDays_Warning}: Note: For the time being, you can only change your furthest day reached.
languageStrings.DLG_SaveDataAlreadyOpened: There is a save file open already. If you didn't save changes, they will be lost.
languageStrings.DLG_InvalidSaveFile: This save file is invalid. Size must be exactly 3,200,512 bytes (PS4/Switch) or 3,201,572 bytes (PC)
languageStrings.DLG_BackupCheckboxNotChecked:
You didn't check the "Make a backup" checkbox. There's a chance the save file ends up being corrupted.
Do you wish to continue?
languageStrings.DLG_SaveDataSaved: The changes have been successfully made to the save file.
languageStrings.DLG_SaveSlotDumped: The save slot has been dumped.
languageStrings.DLG_BackupNotPossibleFileNotFound: Note that I couldn't make a backup because the original file stopped existing for some reason (did you delete or move it?)
languageStrings.DLG_InvalidSlotFile: This slot file is invalid. Size must be exactly 319,952 bytes.
languageStrings.DLG_OverwriteSlotPrompt: Are you sure you want to overwrite this save slot?
languageStrings.DLG_DeleteAllPinsAreYouSure: Are you sure you want to remove all pins from your inventory?
languageStrings.DLG_AddAllPinsAreYouSure: Are you sure you want to add every pin to your inventory?
languageStrings.DLG_NoPinsToAddSelected: You didn't select a pin to add.
languageStrings.DLG_YouCantAddMorePins: You can't add more pins of this kind. Maximum value is 99.
languageStrings.DLG_ZeroPinsWarning:
Note that the game will crash if you have 0 pins.
Make sure you add enough pins and equip them to your characters.
languageStrings.DLG_DeleteAllClothingAreYouSure: Are you sure you want to remove all clothes from your inventory?
languageStrings.DLG_NoClothingToAddSelected: You didn't select a clothing piece to add.
languageStrings.DLG_YouCantAddMoreClothes: You can't add more clothes. Maximum value is 9 for one piece, and 2100 in total.
languageStrings.DLG_NewUpdateFound: There is a new version of Scramble. Do you want to check it out?
languageStrings.DLG_NoCheckboxSelected_SkillTree: You didn't tick any of the checkboxes. What am I supposed to (un)lock?
languageStrings.DLG_ActionWillSpoil: This action will reveal spoilers. Are you sure you want to continue?
languageStrings.DLG_StartFromBeginning: Are you sure that you want to change your current day? You will start from the beginning of that day.
languageStrings.DLG_FurthestDayCantBeLowerThanCurrentDay: Your furthest day cannot be lower than your current day.
languageStrings.{NeoTwewyRandomizer}: NEO: The World Ends with You — Randomizer
languageStrings.{RandomizerOverviewDesc}: The NEO:TWEWY randomizer is a tool that allows you to create a completely random playthrough experience. While you can use this on your already advanced save data, it is recommended that you use it on recently created files (near the beginning of the game), for a better experience and in order to minimize bugs. Because NEO's save data is very fragile (in the sense that any tiny change could break the game), be sure to always make a backup of your save, otherwise it can result in a softlock that may even occur when you least expect it.
languageStrings.{RandomizerChoice_Ok}: This choice should work fine for the most part.
languageStrings.{RandomizerChoice_Buggy}: This choice can have unintended effects in the future.
languageStrings.{RandomizerChoice_HighlyExperimental}: This choice is highly experimental and will break your save file.
languageStrings.{PcGlobalYouCantEditThisYet}: You can't edit these settings with a PC save file (for the time being). Please edit these in-game.
languageStrings.{BestFoodForRestaurants}: Set the best tasting food possible for all restaurants
languageStrings.{ClothingGoodsNote}: Note for clothing items: The game will automatically change these values to match the amount in your inventory.
languageStrings.{KofiButtonTip}: Scramble is free and open-source! If you want to show support, you can donate! I'll appreciate it ^^
languageStrings.{ThereAreIssues}: There are some issues that can break your game if they are not resolved:
languageStrings.{ThereAreNoIssues}: There were no issues found with the current values.
languageStrings.{Issue_DuplicatePartyMember}: - There is at least one duplicate party member.
languageStrings.{Issue_NoEquippedPinOnDeck1}: - There is at least one member without an equipped pin on Deck 1.
